p.draft-comment: This topic should present the structure of the publishing template descriptor and information that can be displayed in it: page templates, tags, preview image and so on.
WH-1448 - The template allows you to copy a set of resources to the output folder.
The preview image should have a recommended size.

section.p: Each WebHelp Publishing template includes a descriptor file which defines the meta-data associated with that template. The template descriptor is an XML file that defines all the resources included by a template like HTML page templates, CSS, JS, fonts, transformation parameters.
It is an XML file that should be located in the root folder associated with the template.
section.note: It is recommended to edit it in the oXygen XML editor because you will get content completion and validation.
